articles.author: Matt Ford
articles.title: Hungary: Magyar launches anti-Orban election campaign - DW.com
articles.description: Peter Magyar's opposition Tisza party is pledging to combat corruption in one of the European Union's poorest countries and reverse Budapest's pivot towards Russia.
articles.content: Hungarian opposition leader Peter Magyar launched his party's election campaign in Budapest on Sunday, vowing to end the 16-year rule of Prime Minister Viktor Orban, tackle corruption and reorientate… [+3800 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Rubio casts US, the 'child of Europe', as critical friend to allies - The Economic Times
articles.description: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio emphasised the enduring bond between America and Europe, by declaring that US will always be a child of Europe. He highlighted the vital importance of the trans-Atlantic alliance, cautioning against the complacency that eme…
articles.content: MUNICH: Secretary of State Marco Rubio cast the United States as the "child of Europe" in a message of unity on Saturday, offering some reassurance as well as levelling more criticism at allies after… [+4945 chars]
